plot: Wander/lost is a tone poem that embodies the ideas of traveling, disorientation, loss, and redemption.
title: Wander/Lost
plot_es: Wander/lost is a tone poem that embodies the ideas of traveling, disorientation, loss, and redemption.
plot_en: Wander/lost is a tone poem that embodies the ideas of traveling, disorientation, loss, and redemption.
